name: Oracle Cave
description: A sacred cave serves as a place of divine prophecy and spiritual insight, providing guidance and foresight to those who seek it. The prophetic nature provides valuable information and spiritual guidance, while the divine connection attracts both seekers of truth and those who would manipulate the prophecies.
atmosphere: Smooth stone walls reflect whispered prophecies while crystal formations pulse with inner light. Ancient smoke and divination herbs create intoxicating scents. Prophetic symbols are carved into every surface alongside bowls of sacred oils. Strange echoes seem to carry words from past and future.
